verses.verse: Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and well advanced <S%H935><s%> in years. <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H2204><s%> "You are old and advanced <S%H935><s%> in years, <S%H3117><s%> and there remains <S%H7604><s%> yet very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to be possessed. <S%H3423><s%>
"This is the land <S%H776><s%> that still remains: <S%H7604><s%> all the regions <S%H1552><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and all the Geshurites; <S%H1651><s%>

from the Shihor, <S%H7883><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> which is counted <S%H2803><s%> as Canaanite; <S%H3669><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> the Gazites, <S%H5841><s%> and the Ashdodites, <S%H796><s%> the Ashkelonites, <S%H832><s%> the Gittites, <S%H1663><s%> and the Ekronites; <S%H6139><s%> also the Avvim, <S%H5761><s%>

on the south; <S%H8486><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and Mearah <S%H4632><s%> that belongs to the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> to Aphek, <S%H663><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites; <S%H567><s%>

and the land <S%H776><s%> of the Gebalites, <S%H1382><s%> and all Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> toward the sunrise, <S%H4217><s%> from Baal Gad <S%H1171><s%> under Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> to the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%>

all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the hill country <S%H2022><s%> from Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> to Misrephoth Maim, <S%H4956><s%> even all the Sidonians; <S%H6722><s%> them will I drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> only allocate <S%H5307><s%> it to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as I have commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>

Now therefore divide <S%H2505><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"

With him the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them, <S%H5676><s%> beyond the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> even as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave them: <S%H5414><s%>

from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> that is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> of Medeba <S%H4311><s%> to Dibon; <S%H1769><s%>

and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

and Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and Maacathites, <S%H4602><s%> and all Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%> to Salecah; <S%H5548><s%>

all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and in Edrei <S%H154><s%> (the same was left <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>); for Moses <S%H4872><s%> attacked <S%H5221><s%> these, <S%H3423><s%> and drove them out.

Nevertheless the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the Geshurites, <S%H1651><s%> nor the Maacathites: <S%H4602><s%> but Geshur <S%H1651><s%> and Maacath <S%H4602><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Only he gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%> The offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> are his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as he spoke to him. <S%H1696><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> that is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> by Medeba; <S%H4311><s%>
Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and all its cities <S%H5892><s%> that are in the plain; <S%H4334><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> Bamoth Baal, <S%H1120><s%> Beth Baal Meon, <S%H1010><s%>
Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> Kedemoth, <S%H6932><s%> Mephaath, <S%H4158><s%>
Kiriathaim, <S%H7156><s%> Sibmah, <S%H7643><s%> Zereth Shahar <S%H6890><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%>
Beth Peor, <S%H1047><s%> the slopes of Pisgah, <S%H798><s%> Beth Jeshimoth, <S%H1020><s%>

all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H4334><s%> and all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> with the chiefs <S%H5387><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Evi, <S%H189><s%> Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> Zur, <S%H6698><s%> Hur, <S%H2354><s%> and Reba, <S%H7254><s%> the princes <S%H5257><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> alse killed <S%H2026><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor, <S%H1160><s%> the soothsayer, <S%H7080><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> among the rest <S%H413><s%> of their slain. <S%H2491><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> was the bank <S%H1366><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> This was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and its villages. <S%H2691><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> was Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> to Aroer <S%H6177><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Rabbah; <S%H7237><s%>
and from Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> to Ramath Mizpeh, <S%H7434><s%> and Betonim; <S%H993><s%> and from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Debir; <S%H1688><s%>

and in the valley, <S%H6010><s%> Beth Haram, <S%H1027><s%> Beth Nimrah, <S%H1039><s%> Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and Zaphon, <S%H6829><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>'s bank, <S%H1366><s%> to the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and its villages. <S%H2691><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance to the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%> It was for the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Mahanaim, <S%H4266><s%> all Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> which are in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

Half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> Ashtaroth, <S%H6252><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> were for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> even for the half <S%H2677><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

These are the inheritances <S%H5157><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> distributed in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>

But to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as he spoke to them. <S%H1696><s%>
